title: RENEW YOUR SSVC MEMBERSHIP BEFORE VICTORIA FARM

posts.content:
RENEW YOUR SSVC MEMBERSHIP BEFORE VICTORIA FARM
 
As you will already know, camping at Victoria Farm for the club AGM/Annual Rally/Stanford Hall weekend is strictly for SSVC members, apart from the one guest unit allowed per club member.

In order to be fair to everyone club members will be asked to show their current membership card on arrival at Victoria Farm.

A current membership list, up to date as of that weekend, will be used to check the membership of anyone who is unable to show their card.

Therefore will all members who intend to join us at Victoria Farm and who have a membership expiry date of April 2007 or earlier (shown on your membership card) please ensure that you have renewed your membership with Melanie Pratt (contact details in the club magazine) by the end of April to ensure that you are included on the current membership list.

Also if you are inviting a guest unit to camp but don't intend to arrive at Victoria Farm at the same time as your guest then will you please
ensure that your guest knows your membership number in order to speed up booking in at the gate.

Thank you.
Cant remember if Weve renewed ?? Bob & Julie Copley
sent off this morning
